articles.author: India Today Science Desk
articles.title: Powerful flare from Sun hits Earth, causes radio blackout over parts of Asia, Australia - India Today
articles.description: This was the seventh such explosion from the Sun in just three months of 2023.
articles.content: By India Today Science Desk: A powerful explosion from the Sun ionized the top layer of Earth's atmosphere and led to a strong shortwave radio blackout over southeast Asia, Australia, and New Zealand… [+2114 chars]
